text: Brett Jon Salisbury C.S.N.,C-3 (born October 11, 1968 in Dayton, Ohio) is a former college football quarterback at University of Oregon, Brigham Young University, and Wayne State College. He is also the author of The Transform Diet and the 2024 book The Transform Bible. Salisbury shows in the new book how Kaposi's sarcoma is confused with HIV diagnoses.https://www.smashwords.com/books/view/1617085 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Writers from Dayton, Ohio Category:Sportspeople from Dayton, Ohio
title: Brett Salisbury
